name: Axe Throwing - A Gem Jam 2 Entry
name_original: Axe Throwing - A Gem Jam 2 Entry
description:
Axe throwing championship!

Throw your axe as you aim to take down your opponent.

Tap or click the screen to throw your axe. Tap again to jump and avoid any opponent's axe.  Your Axe returns to you on the after the jump.

Made in GDevelop5 for the Gem Jam 2.
